author: makortel
body:
Reverts cms-sw/cmssw#44767

Given the large number of related failures in IBs (also https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/44887, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/44888)
title: Revert "Throw a clear exception if OutputModule SelectEvents refers to a non-existent Path or Process"
